:rotating_light: *Launch Alert!* :rotating_light:

Introducing Revert :sparkles: (<https://revert.dev><https://revert.dev%29|)> - a single API to build customer facing CRM integrations.

Over the past 6 months, I spent a ton of time building a tool for developers that involved 50+ integrations.

I spoke to 100+ developers & 50+ companies in the process but no one wanted what I had built.

During those conversations however, CTOs told me that instead of integrating third party tools (think Slack/ Salesforce) with their internal processes (which my product solved for), they’d rather have a faster way to integrate with their customer’s or user’s tools.

Having built some of the hardest integrations in the past (*cough* Salesforce *cough*) for my products and gone through the same pain of it myself, I wished there was a better experience around it for sure.

This is my attempt to fix just that.

Here’s how we solve it:

-> We’re a single API/Schema to build all your customer facing CRM integrations.
-> The goal is to allow SaaS companies to ship their 6 month roadmap in a matter of few days with a 10x better DX (Developer experience).

We currently support:
1. Salesforce
2. HubSpot
3. Zoho CRM
I’m launching *hilariously* early as I build it (still in alpha) so that I can get my network’s thoughts on the problem and if you’d like to try it out as we build it.

Request early access!: <https://revert.dev>

We’re also live on Product Hunt!

Show us your support: <https://www.producthunt.com/posts/revert-2>
